name: Chandrashekher Prasad
designation: B.Tech Student | Frontend Developer | Tech Enthusiast
summary: I am a passionate and dedicated B.Tech student at Maharaja Agrasen Institute of Technology, New Delhi, specializing in Frontend Development and exploring the world of technology. With expertise in data structures and algorithms in Java and a robust foundation in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, I am continuously enhancing my skills by learning React JS and working on innovative projects. I also have hands-on experience with C and Python programming.

projects.name: CinemaSense
projects.description: Designed an interactive MovieGPT website that suggests personalized movie recommendations using GPT API.

projects.name: TasteTrail
projects.description: Developed a dynamic food app to help users discover top-rated restaurants and dishes near their current lo-cation.

projects.name: CPStore
projects.description: CPStore is an e-commerce website where customers can easily browse, order, and get shop items delivered to their doorstep.

education.degree: B.Tech in Information Technology and Engineering
